paragraphs.paragraph: My name is Lucy. I work at Kennedy Space Center. My job is to monitor  the rocket launches. Speaking of rocket launches. One launched off today. I remember it fading away into space. It was amazing.
Hey! Guess what there's going to be another rocket launch. I'm in charge of watching the rocket blast off to make sure that there are no problems with the launch.

5 PM: I donâ€™t know what happened. The space station said that their crew-mates attacked them and bit them one by one. I just got a notification that the emergency capsule has launched on automated mode not manual mode.
I dispatched a team to get the emergency capsule out of the ocean by using a helicopter to rescue the crew.
1 PM: It's been 1 hour.  The rescue team should be there right now picking up the emergency capsule and the crew inside of it.
4 PM: The rescue team just returned. They say that the crew in the capsule were hostile and they did not respond to any commands. They just kept running and attacking and biting.
